actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."point" SET
		"pointid" = '{{update_form.fieldState.pointid.isVisible ? update_form.formData.pointid : update_form.sourceData.pointid}}',
		"type" = '{{update_form.fieldState.type.isVisible ? update_form.formData.type : update_form.sourceData.type}}',
    "easting" = '{{update_form.fieldState.easting.isVisible ? update_form.formData.easting : update_form.sourceData.easting}}',
		"northing" = '{{update_form.fieldState.northing.isVisible ? update_form.formData.northing : update_form.sourceData.northing}}',
		"hole_depth" = '{{update_form.fieldState.hole_depth.isVisible ? update_form.formData.hole_depth : update_form.sourceData.hole_depth}}',
		"elevation" = '{{update_form.fieldState.elevation.isVisible ? update_form.formData.elevation : update_form.sourceData.elevation}}',
		"datetime" = '{{update_form.fieldState.datetime.isVisible ? update_form.formData.datetime : update_form.sourceData.datetime}}',
		"area" = '{{update_form.fieldState.area.isVisible ? update_form.formData.area : update_form.sourceData.area}}',
		"panel" = '{{update_form.fieldState.panel.isVisible ? update_form.formData.panel : update_form.sourceData.panel}}',
		"original_ground_elevation" = '{{update_form.fieldState.original_ground_elevation.isVisible ? update_form.formData.original_ground_elevation : update_form.sourceData.original_ground_elevation}}',
		"remarks" = '{{update_form.fieldState.remarks.isVisible ? update_form.formData.remarks : update_form.sourceData.remarks}}'
	WHERE "id" = {{data_table.selectedRow.id}};/
